title: Valtair
body:
Valtair

Anastasia was sitting on the top of the Black Castle looking at the dark sky.

The sky in the shadow realm was pitch black. There were no clouds, stars, moon or anything else in the sky of the shadow realm.

The entire shadow realm was shrouded in a dark aura without a single particle of light, giving the people watching it a feeling of loneliness and despair.

"It's been over thirty days since the Master reestablished his connection with the Shadow Realm. I wonder when he will return?" Anastasia muttered to herself looking at the black sky.

Thud! Thud! Rat-tat-tat!

Suddenly Anastasia heard some sounds and a annoyed expression appeared on her face.

"These bastards are attacking the entrance to the Shadow Realm like it's their neighbour's door" Anastasia waved her hand and a screen appeared before her showing some demons attacking on the entrance portal of the Shadow Realm.
